mainText:
i dont really know what to say, steve was one of my role models. everything i know about public speaking and presenting if its on youtube or if it was standing up at university giving a presentation to my class mates, i looked at him and took notes. he was a genius. a GENIUS. i thank steve and you guys at apple for everything you have done to change this world. my life is submersed with apple products, im using this macbook air to type this. i use an ipod touch when i go running and i use my iphone everyday to keep in touch with friends and family. you have made technology desirable.
thank you so much. rest in peace champ
author: Salv
